mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MALL( USER_EMAIL, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_PHONENUMBER, USER_HOMENUMBER, USER_ADDRESS, USER_PROFILE_PHOTO, USER_REGISTATION, USER_RATING, USER_POINT, USER_REGISTCHAR ) VALUES ( #{userEmail}, #{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{userPno}, #{userHno}, #{userAdd}, #{userProfilePhoto}, #{userReg}, #{userRating}, #{userPoint}, #{userRegChar} )
